name: Avocado Smoothie
description: A creamy smoothie made with ripe avocado, banana, and almond milk for a healthy treat.
ingredients: avocado, banana, almond milk, honey
instructions: 1. In a blender, combine avocado, banana, almond milk, and honey. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve chilled.

name: Spinach and Banana Smoothie
description: A nutritious and delicious smoothie made with fresh spinach and ripe banana, perfect for a healthy breakfast.
ingredients: spinach, banana, almond milk, honey
instructions: 1. In a blender, combine spinach, banana, almond milk, and honey. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Pour into a glass and serve immediately.

name: Watermelon Mint Juice
description: A refreshing juice made with juicy watermelon and fresh mint, ideal for hot summer days.
ingredients: watermelon, mint leaves, lime juice
instructions: 1. Cut watermelon into cubes and place in a blender. 2. Add mint leaves and lime juice. 3. Blend until smooth and strain if desired. 4. Serve chilled.

name: Mango Lassi
description: A creamy and delicious yogurt-based drink with mango and spices, popular in Indian cuisine.
ingredients: mango, yogurt, milk, sugar, cardamom
instructions: 1. In a blender, combine ripe mango, yogurt, milk, sugar, and cardamom. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve chilled in a glass.

name: Hibiscus Tea
description: A vibrant herbal tea made from dried hibiscus flowers, known for its tangy flavor and health benefits.
ingredients: dried hibiscus flowers, water, sugar (optional)
instructions: 1. Boil water and add dried hibiscus flowers. 2. Simmer for 10 minutes, then strain. 3. Sweeten with sugar if desired and serve hot or cold.

name: Matcha Latte
description: A creamy and energizing latte made with matcha green tea powder and milk, packed with antioxidants.
ingredients: matcha powder, milk (dairy or plant-based), sweetener (optional)
instructions: 1. Whisk matcha powder with a small amount of hot water to form a paste. 2. Heat milk and froth if desired. 3. Combine matcha paste with milk and sweeten if desired. 4. Serve warm.

name: Kefir Smoothie
description: A probiotic-rich smoothie made with kefir, fruits, and honey for a healthy boost.
ingredients: kefir, banana, berries, honey
instructions: 1. In a blender, combine kefir, banana, berries, and honey. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve immediately.

name: Lemon Ginger Tea
description: A soothing tea made with fresh ginger and lemon, perfect for digestion and boosting immunity.
ingredients: water, fresh ginger, lemon juice, honey
instructions: 1. Boil water and add sliced ginger. 2. Simmer for 10 minutes, then strain into a cup. 3. Add lemon juice and honey to taste. 4. Serve warm.

name: Avocado Banana Shake
description: A creamy shake made with ripe avocado and banana, rich in healthy fats and nutrients.
ingredients: avocado, banana, milk (dairy or plant-based), honey
instructions: 1. In a blender, combine avocado, banana, milk, and honey. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve chilled.

name: Coconut Milk Chia Pudding
description: A nutritious pudding made with coconut milk and chia seeds, perfect for breakfast or dessert.
ingredients: coconut milk, chia seeds, honey, vanilla extract
instructions: 1. In a bowl, combine coconut milk, chia seeds, honey, and vanilla extract. 2. Stir well and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight. 3. Serve chilled, topped with fruits if desired.

name: Pomegranate Juice
description: A refreshing juice made with fresh pomegranate seeds, rich in antioxidants and vitamins.
ingredients: pomegranate seeds, water, sugar (optional)
instructions: 1. Extract the juice from pomegranate seeds using a juicer or blender. 2. Strain if desired and sweeten with sugar if needed. 3. Serve chilled.

name: Green Tea with Mint
description: A soothing green tea infused with fresh mint leaves, great for relaxation and digestion.
ingredients: green tea leaves, water, mint leaves, honey (optional)
instructions: 1. Boil water and steep green tea leaves and mint leaves for 3-5 minutes. 2. Strain into a cup and sweeten with honey if desired. 3. Serve hot or cold.

name: Strawberry Basil Lemonade
description: A refreshing lemonade infused with strawberries and basil for a unique twist.
ingredients: water, lemon juice, strawberries, basil leaves, sugar
instructions: 1. In a pitcher, combine water, lemon juice, strawberries, basil leaves, and sugar. 2. Stir until sugar is dissolved. 3. Serve over ice.

name: Turmeric Ginger Tea
description: A warming tea made with turmeric and ginger, known for its anti-inflammatory properties.
ingredients: water, turmeric powder, fresh ginger, honey
instructions: 1. Boil water and add turmeric powder and sliced ginger. 2. Simmer for 10 minutes, then strain. 3. Sweeten with honey and serve warm.

name: Berry Protein Shake
description: A delicious and nutritious shake made with mixed berries and protein powder, perfect for post-workout.
ingredients: mixed berries, protein powder, almond milk, honey
instructions: 1. In a blender, combine mixed berries, protein powder, almond milk, and honey. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve immediately.

name: Cucumber and Lime Sparkler
description: A refreshing drink made with cucumber and lime, great for hydration.
ingredients: sparkling water, cucumber slices, lime juice, mint leaves
instructions: 1. In a glass, combine sparkling water, cucumber slices, lime juice, and mint leaves. 2. Stir gently and serve over ice.

name: Almond Butter Smoothie
description: A creamy and nutritious smoothie made with almond butter, banana, and milk, perfect for a protein boost.
ingredients: almond butter, banana, almond milk, honey, ice
instructions: 1. In a blender, combine almond butter, banana, almond milk, honey, and ice. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve immediately.

name: Fresh Vegetable Juice
description: A healthy and refreshing juice made with a variety of fresh vegetables, great for detoxification.
ingredients: carrots, celery, cucumber, spinach, lemon
instructions: 1. In a juicer, combine carrots, celery, cucumber, spinach, and lemon juice. 2. Juice until smooth and serve chilled.

name: Orange and Carrot Juice
description: A sweet and tangy juice made with fresh oranges and carrots, rich in vitamin C and beta-carotene.
ingredients: oranges, carrots
instructions: 1. Peel oranges and chop carrots. 2. In a juicer, combine oranges and carrots. 3. Juice until smooth and serve immediately.

name: Berry Acai Bowl Smoothie
description: A vibrant smoothie bowl made with acai berries and mixed berries, topped with granola and nuts.
ingredients: acai puree, mixed berries, banana, granola, nuts
instructions: 1. In a blender, combine acai puree, mixed berries, and banana. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Pour into a bowl and top with granola and nuts.

name: Cinnamon Apple Cider
description: A warm and comforting drink made with apple cider and spices, perfect for fall.
ingredients: apple cider, cinnamon sticks, cloves
instructions: 1. In a pot, combine apple cider, cinnamon sticks, and cloves. 2. Heat over medium heat until warm. 3. Serve hot in mugs.

name: Strawberry Watermelon Juice
description: A refreshing juice combining sweet strawberries and juicy watermelon, perfect for summer.
ingredients: strawberries, watermelon
instructions: 1. Cut strawberries and watermelon into pieces. 2. In a blender, combine strawberries and watermelon. 3. Blend until smooth and serve chilled.

name: Coconut Mango Smoothie
description: A tropical smoothie made with coconut milk and ripe mango, creamy and refreshing.
ingredients: coconut milk, mango, honey, ice
instructions: 1. In a blender, combine coconut milk, mango, honey, and ice. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve immediately.

name: Papaya Ginger Smoothie
description: A tropical smoothie made with ripe papaya and fresh ginger for a zesty kick.
ingredients: papaya, ginger, yogurt, honey, ice
instructions: 1. In a blender, combine papaya, ginger, yogurt, honey, and ice. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve immediately.

name: Chocolate Banana Protein Shake
description: A delicious shake made with chocolate protein powder and banana, great for post-workout.
ingredients: chocolate protein powder, banana, almond milk, ice
instructions: 1. In a blender, combine chocolate protein powder, banana, almond milk, and ice. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve immediately.

name: Herbal Detox Tea
description: A soothing tea made with herbal ingredients known for their detoxifying properties.
ingredients: herbal tea bag, hot water, lemon juice, honey
instructions: 1. Steep herbal tea bag in hot water for 5 minutes. 2. Add lemon juice and honey to taste. 3. Serve hot.

name: Lavender Lemonade
description: A fragrant and refreshing lemonade infused with lavender for a unique flavor.
ingredients: water, lemon juice, lavender syrup, sugar
instructions: 1. In a pitcher, combine water, lemon juice, lavender syrup, and sugar. 2. Stir until sugar dissolves. 3. Serve over ice.

name: Mango Coconut Water
description: A hydrating drink made with fresh mango and coconut water, perfect for hot days.
ingredients: mango, coconut water, lime juice
instructions: 1. In a blender, combine mango, coconut water, and lime juice. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Serve chilled.

name: Raspberry Lemonade
description: A sweet and tangy lemonade made with fresh raspberries for a vibrant color.
ingredients: water, lemon juice, raspberries, sugar

description: Sweet dates filled with nut butter for a tasty treat.
ingredients: dates, almond butter
instructions: 1. Slice dates and remove pits. 2. Fill with almond butter. 3. Serve as a snack.

name: Baked Sweet Potato Fries
description: Crispy baked sweet potato fries seasoned with spices.
ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, spices
instructions: 1. Cut sweet potatoes into fries. 2. Toss with olive oil and spices. 3. Bake until crispy.

name: Homemade Trail Mix
description: A mix of nuts, seeds, and dried fruits, great for snacking.
ingredients: nuts (almonds, cashews), seeds, dried fruits
instructions: 1. Combine nuts, seeds, and dried fruits. 2. Serve as a snack.

name: Cucumber Sandwiches
description: Light sandwiches made with cucumber slices and cream cheese for a refreshing snack.
ingredients: cucumber, cream cheese, whole grain bread
instructions: 1. Spread cream cheese on bread. 2. Layer cucumber slices and top with another slice. 3. Cut into quarters.

name: Hard-Boiled Eggs
description: Classic hard-boiled eggs seasoned with salt, a protein-packed snack.
ingredients: eggs, salt
instructions: 1. Boil eggs for 10-12 minutes. 2. Cool, peel, and season with salt before serving.

name: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
description: Juicy grilled chicken marinated in lemon and herbs, perfect for a summer barbecue.
ingredients: chicken breasts, lemon juice, garlic, rosemary, olive oil, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. In a bowl, combine lemon juice, minced garlic, chopped rosemary, olive oil, salt, and pepper. 2. Add chicken breasts and marinate for at least 30 minutes in the refrigerator. 3. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. 4. Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. 5. Let rest for 5 minutes before slicing. Serve with lemon wedges.

name: Baked Salmon with Garlic and Dijon
description: Tender salmon fillets baked with garlic, Dijon mustard, and fresh herbs.
ingredients: salmon fillets, garlic, Dijon mustard, olive oil, lemon, parsley, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). 2. In a small bowl, mix minced garlic, Dijon mustard, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. 3. Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper. 4. Spread the garlic-Dijon mixture over the salmon. 5. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the salmon flakes easily with a fork. 6. Garnish with chopped parsley before serving.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: A popular Indian dish made with marinated chicken simmered in a spiced tomato sauce.
ingredients: chicken thighs, yogurt, garlic, ginger, garam masala, canned tomatoes, cream, onion, cilantro
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt, minced garlic, ginger, and garam masala for at least 1 hour. 2. In a pan, sauté chopped onions until golden. 3. Add marinated chicken and cook until browned. 4. Stir in canned tomatoes and cream, and simmer for 20 minutes. 5. Garnish with chopped cilantro before serving. Serve with rice or naan.

name: Shrimp Scampi with Garlic and Lemon
description: Succulent shrimp sautéed in a garlic and lemon butter sauce, served with pasta.
ingredients: shrimp, garlic, lemon, butter, parsley, white wine, spaghetti
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. 3. Add minced garlic and sauté until fragrant. 4. Add shrimp and cook until pink. 5. Stir in lemon juice, white wine, and chopped parsley. 6. Toss cooked spaghetti with the shrimp mixture and serve immediately.

name: Beef Stir-Fry with Broccoli
description: Quick and healthy stir-fry featuring tender beef and fresh broccoli in a savory sauce.
ingredients: beef sirloin, broccoli, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, sesame oil, bell pepper, onion
instructions: 1. Slice beef thinly against the grain. 2. Heat sesame oil in a wok over high heat. 3. Add beef and stir-fry until browned. 4. Add minced garlic and ginger, and stir-fry for 1 minute. 5. Add broccoli, sliced bell pepper, and soy sauce. 6. Cook for another 3-4 minutes until vegetables are tender. Serve hot with rice.

name: Spicy Tuna Poke Bowl
description: Fresh sushi-grade tuna served over rice with avocado, seaweed, and a spicy sauce.
ingredients: tuna, sushi rice, soy sauce, avocado, seaweed, green onion, sriracha
instructions: 1. Cook sushi rice according to package instructions. 2. Cut tuna into cubes and toss with soy sauce and sriracha. 3. Slice avocado and chop green onions. 4. Assemble poke bowls with rice at the bottom, topped with tuna, avocado, and seaweed. 5. Garnish with green onions before serving.

name: Honey Garlic Glazed Chicken Wings
description: Crispy chicken wings coated in a sweet and tangy honey garlic sauce.
ingredients: chicken wings, honey, garlic, soy sauce, ginger, sesame seeds
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). 2. In a bowl, mix honey, minced garlic, soy sauce, and ginger. 3. Toss chicken wings in the mixture and place on a baking sheet. 4. Bake for 30-35 minutes, flipping halfway through, until crispy. 5. Sprinkle with sesame seeds before serving.

name: Fish Tacos with Cabbage Slaw
description: Light and refreshing fish tacos topped with a crunchy cabbage slaw and creamy sauce.
ingredients: white fish, corn tortillas, cabbage, lime, cilantro, mayonnaise, cumin
instructions: 1. Grill or pan-fry fish until cooked through. 2. In a bowl, mix shredded cabbage, lime juice, and chopped cilantro. 3. Assemble tacos with fish in corn tortillas, topped with cabbage slaw and a drizzle of mayonnaise. 4. Serve with lime wedges.

name: Lemon Garlic Roasted Chicken Thighs
description: Savory chicken thighs roasted with garlic, lemon, and herbs for maximum flavor.
ingredients: chicken thighs, garlic, lemon, thyme, rosemary, olive oil, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C). 2. In a bowl, mix minced garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, thyme, rosemary, salt, and pepper. 3. Coat chicken thighs in the mixture and place in a baking dish. 4. Roast for 35-40 minutes, or until golden brown and cooked through. 5. Let rest for 5 minutes before serving.

name: Teriyaki Salmon with Rice
description: Delicious salmon glazed with teriyaki sauce, served over steamed rice.
ingredients: salmon fillets, teriyaki sauce, rice, sesame seeds, green onion
instructions: 1. Cook rice according to package instructions. 2. In a skillet, heat teriyaki sauce and add salmon fillets. 3. Cook for 5-7 minutes per side, or until salmon is cooked through. 4. Serve salmon over rice, garnished with sesame seeds and sliced green onions.

name: Balsamic Glazed Pork Chops
description: Juicy pork chops seared and finished with a balsamic reduction for a sweet-tart flavor.
ingredients: pork chops, balsamic vinegar, honey, garlic, rosemary, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Season pork chops with salt and pepper. 2. In a skillet, sear chops over medium-high heat until browned on both sides. 3. Remove from skillet and add balsamic vinegar, honey, and minced garlic to create a sauce. 4. Return pork to skillet, coating with sauce, and simmer for 5 minutes. 5. Serve with remaining sauce drizzled on top.

name: Chicken Fajitas with Bell Peppers
description: Sizzling chicken fajitas cooked with bell peppers and onions, served with tortillas.
ingredients: chicken breast, bell peppers, onion, fajita seasoning, tortillas
instructions: 1. Slice chicken and vegetables. 2. In a skillet, cook chicken with fajita seasoning until cooked through. 3. Add sliced bell peppers and onions, cooking until softened. 4. Serve with warm tortillas and toppings like salsa and guacamole.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Ground Turkey
description: Bell peppers filled with a savory mixture of ground turkey, rice, and spices, baked until tender.
ingredients: bell peppers, ground turkey, rice, onion, garlic, tomato sauce
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 2. Cook rice according to package instructions. 3. In a pan, sauté ground turkey, chopped onion, and garlic until cooked. 4. Mix turkey with cooked rice and tomato sauce. 5. Hollow out bell peppers and stuff them with the mixture. 6. Bake for 30-35 minutes until peppers are tender.

name: Prawn Curry with Coconut Milk
description: Rich and creamy prawn curry cooked with coconut milk and spices for a delightful flavor.
ingredients: prawns, coconut milk, curry powder, garlic, ginger, onion
instructions: 1. In a pan, sauté chopped onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant. 2. Add curry powder and cook for another minute. 3. Stir in coconut milk and bring to a simmer. 4. Add prawns and cook until they turn pink. Serve with rice.

name: Cilantro Lime Grilled Chicken
description: Grilled chicken marinated in a zesty cilantro lime sauce, perfect for tacos or salads.
ingredients: chicken breasts, lime juice, cilantro, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. In a bowl, combine lime juice, chopped cilantro, minced garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper. 2. Marinate chicken for at least 30 minutes. 3. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. 4. Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes on each side until cooked through. 5. Let rest before slicing. Serve with lime wedges.

name: Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani)
description: Creamy and flavorful chicken curry made with a rich tomato and butter sauce.
ingredients: chicken, butter, cream, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, coriander, salt
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and spices for at least 1 hour. 2. In a large pan, melt butter and sauté garlic and ginger. 3. Add marinated chicken and cook until browned. 4. Stir in crushed tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes. 5. Add cream, adjust seasoning, and simmer for another 10 minutes. Serve with naan.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: A fragrant and flavorful rice dish layered with marinated chicken and aromatic spices.
ingredients: chicken, basmati rice, yogurt, onions, garlic, ginger, biryani masala, saffron, cilantro, mint
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt, spices, and half the fried onions for 1 hour. 2. Cook basmati rice with whole spices until partially done, then drain. 3. In a large pot, layer marinated chicken, partially cooked rice, saffron, cilantro, and mint. 4. Cover tightly and cook on low heat for 30-40 minutes until chicken is cooked and flavors meld. Serve hot.

name: Fish Curry (Masala Meen Curry)
description: A spicy and tangy fish curry made with coconut milk and aromatic spices.
ingredients: fish fillets, coconut milk, onion, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, curry leaves, turmeric, chili powder
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. 2. Add tomatoes, curry leaves, turmeric, and chili powder, and cook until the mixture thickens. 3. Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer. 4. Add fish fillets and cook for 10-15 minutes until the fish is cooked through. Serve with rice.

name: Mutton Rogan Josh
description: A traditional Kashmiri dish featuring tender mutton cooked in a fragrant and spicy gravy.
ingredients: mutton, yogurt, onions, garlic, ginger, Kashmiri red chili, cardamom, cinnamon, salt
instructions: 1. Marinate mutton in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices for at least 2 hours. 2. In a heavy pot, sauté onions until golden. 3. Add marinated mutton and brown on all sides. 4. Add water, cover, and simmer for 1.5 hours until tender. 5. Adjust seasoning and serve with naan or rice.

name: Chicken Korma
description: A rich and creamy chicken curry made with yogurt, nuts, and aromatic spices.
ingredients: chicken, yogurt, almonds, onions, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cream, coriander
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, and ginger for at least 1 hour. 2. In a pot, sauté onions until golden. 3. Add marinated chicken and cook until browned. 4. Stir in ground almonds, cream, and spices, and simmer until chicken is cooked through. Serve with rice or naan.

name: Prawn Masala
description: Spicy prawns cooked in a rich tomato and onion gravy with Indian spices.
ingredients: prawns, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, garam masala, chili powder, coriander
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. 2. Add tomatoes, chili powder, and garam masala, and cook until the mixture thickens. 3. Add prawns and cook for 5-7 minutes until they turn pink. Serve with rice or chapati.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Marinated chicken grilled to perfection with a smoky flavor from tandoor spices.
ingredients: chicken, yogurt, tandoori masala, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, oil
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt, tandoori masala, lemon juice, garlic, and ginger for at least 4 hours. 2. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. 3. Grill the chicken for 20-25 minutes, turning occasionally, until cooked through. 4. Serve hot with mint chutney.

name: Hyderabadi Chicken Dum Biryani
description: A fragrant and flavorful biryani made with marinated chicken and layered with saffron rice.
ingredients: chicken, basmati rice, yogurt, onions, garlic, ginger, biryani masala, saffron, mint
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt, spices, and half the fried onions for 1 hour. 2. Cook basmati rice with whole spices until partially done, then drain. 3. In a heavy pot, layer marinated chicken, partially cooked rice, and saffron. 4. Cover tightly and cook on low heat for 40-50 minutes until chicken is tender. Serve with raita.

name: Kadai Chicken
description: A spicy chicken dish cooked with bell peppers and a blend of aromatic spices.
ingredients: chicken, bell peppers, onions, garlic, ginger, kadai masala, tomatoes
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a wok and sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. 2. Add chicken pieces and cook until browned. 3. Stir in chopped tomatoes, bell peppers, and kadai masala, and cook for 15 minutes. Serve with naan or rice.

name: Chicken Chettinad
description: A spicy South Indian chicken curry made with roasted spices and coconut.
ingredients: chicken, coconut, poppy seeds, fennel seeds, cinnamon, cardamom, curry leaves, tomatoes
instructions: 1. Dry roast poppy seeds, fennel seeds, cinnamon, and cardamom until fragrant. 2. Grind to a paste with coconut and set aside. 3. In a pan, sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. 4. Add chicken and cook until browned. 5. Stir in ground spice paste, tomatoes, and curry leaves, and cook until chicken is tender. Serve with rice.

name: Methi Chicken (Fenugreek Chicken)
description: A flavorful chicken curry made with fresh fenugreek leaves and spices.
ingredients: chicken, fenugreek leaves, onions, garlic, ginger, cumin, coriander, turmeric
instructions: 1. In a pan, heat oil and sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. 2. Add chicken and cook until browned. 3. Stir in chopped fenugreek leaves and spices, and cook until chicken is tender. Serve with chapati or rice.

name: Egg Curry (Anda Curry)
description: Hard-boiled eggs cooked in a spicy and tangy tomato gravy.
ingredients: eggs, tomatoes, onions, garlic, ginger, turmeric, chili powder, cumin
instructions: 1. Hard boil the eggs, peel, and set aside. 2. In a pan, sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. 3. Add chopped tomatoes, turmeric, and chili powder, and cook until thick. 4. Add boiled eggs and cook for 5 minutes. Serve with rice or bread.

name: Fish Tikka
description: Marinated fish cubes grilled to perfection, served with mint chutney.
ingredients: fish fillets, yogurt, lemon juice, tikka masala, garlic, ginger
instructions: 1. Marinate fish cubes in yogurt, lemon juice, tikka masala, garlic, and ginger for at least 1 hour. 2. Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. 3. Thread marinated fish onto skewers. 4. Grill for 10-15 minutes, turning occasionally, until cooked. Serve with mint chutney.

name: Keema Matar (Ground Meat with Peas)
description: A spicy and comforting dish made with ground meat and green peas.
ingredients: ground meat (beef/lamb), peas, onions, garlic, ginger, cumin, garam masala, tomatoes
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. 2. Add ground meat and cook until browned. 3. Stir in tomatoes, peas, and spices, and cook until peas are tender. Serve with rice or roti.

name: Prawn Pulao
description: A fragrant rice dish made with prawns and spices, perfect for a quick meal.
ingredients: prawns, basmati rice, onions, garlic, ginger, biryani masala, cilantro
instructions: 1. In a pot, sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. 2. Add prawns and cook until they turn pink. 3. Add soaked basmati rice, biryani masala, and water. 4. Cover and cook on low heat until rice is done. Garnish with cilantro and serve.

name: Malabar Fish Curry
description: A spicy and tangy fish curry from Kerala made with coconut milk and spices.
ingredients: fish fillets, coconut milk, onion, garlic, ginger, green chilies, curry leaves, turmeric, chili powder
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. 2. Add green chilies, curry leaves, and spices, and cook for a minute. 3. Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer. 4. Add fish fillets and cook for 10-15 minutes until the fish is cooked through. Serve with rice.

name: Chicken Vindaloo
description: A spicy and tangy Goan curry made with marinated chicken and a vinegar-based sauce.
ingredients: chicken, vinegar, garlic, ginger, onions, vindaloo masala, potatoes
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with vinegar, garlic, ginger, and vindaloo masala for at least 2 hours. 2. In a pot, sauté chopped onions until golden. 3. Add marinated chicken and cook until browned. 4. Add potatoes and water, and simmer for 40 minutes until chicken and potatoes are tender. Serve with rice.

name: Goan Prawn Curry
description: A flavorful prawn curry made with coconut milk and a blend of spices, typical of Goan cuisine.
ingredients: prawns, coconut milk, onion, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, tamarind, red chili powder
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and spices, and cook until the mixture thickens. 3. Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer. 4. Add prawns and cook for 5-7 minutes until they turn pink. Serve with rice.

name: Mutton Biryani
description: A fragrant rice dish made with marinated mutton and spices, layered for rich flavors.
ingredients: mutton, basmati rice, yogurt, onions, garlic, ginger, biryani masala, saffron
instructions: 1. Marinate mutton in yogurt, spices, and half the fried onions for 1 hour. 2. Cook basmati rice with whole spices until partially done, then drain. 3. In a large pot, layer marinated mutton, partially cooked rice, and saffron. 4. Cover tightly and cook on low heat for 40-50 minutes until mutton is tender. Serve with raita.

name: Chili Chicken
description: A spicy Indo-Chinese dish made with fried chicken pieces and a tangy chili sauce.
ingredients: chicken, garlic, ginger, soy sauce, green chilies, bell peppers, cornflour
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken pieces in soy sauce, garlic, and ginger for 30 minutes. 2. Coat in cornflour and deep fry until golden and crispy. 3. In a pan, sauté chopped bell peppers and green chilies. 4. Add fried chicken and toss with additional soy sauce and spices. Serve hot.

name: Bhuna Chicken
description: A flavorful chicken curry cooked with spices until the oil separates, resulting in a rich taste.
ingredients: chicken, onions, garlic, ginger, tomatoes, garam masala, cumin
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pot and sauté chopped onions until golden. 2. Add garlic and ginger, and sauté for a minute. 3. Add chicken pieces and cook until browned. 4. Stir in chopped tomatoes and spices, and cook until oil separates from the mixture. Serve with naan or rice.

name: Egg Bhurji (Scrambled Eggs)
description: A spiced Indian-style scrambled egg dish with onions, tomatoes, and spices.
ingredients: eggs, onions, tomatoes, green chilies, turmeric, cumin
instructions: 1. In a pan, heat oil and sauté chopped onions and green chilies until onions are translucent. 2. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until soft. 3. Add beaten eggs, turmeric, and cumin, and scramble until cooked. Serve with toast or chapati.

name: Chicken Pakora
description: Crispy fried chicken fritters seasoned with spices and gram flour, served as a snack.
ingredients: chicken, gram flour, garlic, ginger, spices, water, oil
instructions: 1. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and marinate with spices, garlic, and ginger. 2. Mix gram flour with water to make a thick batter. 3. Dip marinated chicken in the batter and deep fry until golden and crispy. Serve with chutney.

name: Lamb Seekh Kebabs
description: Spiced ground lamb skewers grilled to perfection, ideal for appetizers or main courses.
ingredients: ground lamb, onions, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cilantro
instructions: 1. In a bowl, mix ground lamb with finely chopped onions, garlic, ginger, and spices. 2. Form into kebabs on skewers. 3. Grill or broil until cooked through and slightly charred. Serve with mint chutney.

name: Fish Amritsari
description: Spiced fish fillets coated in gram flour and deep-fried, served with a tangy sauce.
ingredients: fish fillets, gram flour, garlic, ginger, red chili powder, ajwain
instructions: 1. Marinate fish fillets with garlic, ginger, and spices for 30 minutes. 2. Dip in gram flour batter and deep fry until crispy and golden. 3. Serve with mint chutney or lemon wedges.

name: Pork Vindaloo
description: A spicy and tangy pork curry made with a vinegar-based marinade and aromatic spices.
ingredients: pork, vinegar, garlic, ginger, onions, vindaloo masala, potatoes
instructions: 1. Marinate pork with vinegar, garlic, ginger, and vindaloo masala for at least 2 hours. 2. In a pot, sauté chopped onions until golden. 3. Add marinated pork and cook until browned. 4. Add potatoes and water, and simmer for 40 minutes until tender. Serve with rice.

name: Baked Tandoori Salmon
description: Salmon fillets marinated in tandoori spices and baked for a healthy twist.
ingredients: salmon fillets, yogurt, tandoori masala, lemon juice, garlic, ginger
instructions: 1. Marinate salmon fillets in yogurt, tandoori masala, lemon juice, garlic, and ginger for at least 30 minutes. 2. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C). 3. Place marinated salmon on a baking tray and bake for 15-20 minutes until cooked through. Serve with a side salad.

name: Mutton Shami Kebabs
description: Spiced minced mutton patties cooked until crispy, perfect as a snack or appetizer.
ingredients: minced mutton, dal, onions, ginger, garlic, spices, oil
instructions: 1. Soak dal and boil until soft. 2. In a pan, sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. 3. Blend minced mutton with cooked dal and sautéed ingredients until smooth. 4. Form into patties and shallow fry until crispy. Serve with chutney.

name: Rawa Fried Fish
description: Crispy fried fish coated in semolina, giving a crunchy texture.
ingredients: fish fillets, semolina, lemon juice, spices, oil
instructions: 1. Marinate fish fillets with lemon juice and spices for 30 minutes. 2. Coat each fillet in semolina. 3. Heat oil in a pan and fry the coated fillets until golden and crispy. Serve with a side of salad or chutney.

name: Chicken Xacuti
description: A spicy Goan curry made with a blend of roasted spices and coconut.
ingredients: chicken, coconut, onions, garlic, ginger, xacuti masala
instructions: 1. Toast and grind spices to make xacuti masala. 2. In a pot, sauté onions, garlic, and ginger until golden. 3. Add chicken and cook until browned. 4. Stir in coconut and xacuti masala, and simmer until chicken is cooked through. Serve with rice.

name: Classic Scrambled Eggs
description: Soft and creamy scrambled eggs, a breakfast classic.
ingredients: eggs, milk, butter, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Crack eggs into a bowl and whisk with milk, salt, and pepper. 2. Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat. 3. Pour in the egg mixture and stir gently. 4. Cook until the eggs are just set but still soft. Serve immediately.

name: Shakshuka (Poached Eggs in Tomato Sauce)
description: A North African dish of poached eggs in a spicy tomato sauce, typically served with bread.
ingredients: eggs, tomatoes, bell peppers, onions, garlic, cumin, paprika, olive oil
instructions: 1. Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté chopped onions, bell peppers, and garlic until soft. 2. Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and simmer for 10 minutes. 3. Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into each well. 4. Cover and cook until eggs are set. Serve with bread.

name: Deviled Eggs
description: Hard-boiled eggs with a creamy, seasoned yolk filling, perfect as a snack or appetizer.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, mustard, paprika, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Cut hard-boiled eggs in half and remove yolks. 2. In a bowl, mash yolks with mayonnaise, mustard, salt, and pepper. 3. Spoon or pipe the mixture back into egg whites. 4. Sprinkle with paprika before serving.

name: Omelette with Vegetables
description: A fluffy omelette filled with a variety of vegetables for a healthy breakfast.
ingredients: eggs, bell peppers, onions, spinach, cheese, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Whisk eggs with salt and pepper. 2. Heat oil in a pan and sauté chopped vegetables until tender. 3. Pour in the egg mixture and cook until the edges are set. 4. Add cheese, fold, and serve warm.

name: Baked Egg Muffins
description: Mini omelettes baked in a muffin tin, perfect for meal prep and on-the-go breakfasts.
ingredients: eggs, spinach, cheese, bell peppers, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). 2. Whisk eggs with salt and pepper. 3. Grease a muffin tin and fill with chopped vegetables and cheese. 4. Pour the egg mixture over the fillings and bake for 20 minutes until set. Allow to cool before removing.

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: A quick and easy fried rice dish with scrambled eggs and vegetables.
ingredients: cooked rice, eggs, peas, carrots, soy sauce, green onions, oil
instructions: 1. In a pan, heat oil and scramble eggs until just set. 2. Add cooked rice, peas, and carrots, and stir-fry for 5 minutes. 3. Pour in soy sauce and mix well. 4. Garnish with chopped green onions before serving.

name: Spanish Tortilla (Potato Omelette)
description: A traditional Spanish dish made with eggs and thinly sliced potatoes, served in wedges.
ingredients: eggs, potatoes, onions, olive oil, salt
instructions: 1. Peel and slice potatoes and onions. 2. Heat olive oil in a pan and cook potatoes and onions until soft. 3. In a bowl, beat eggs with salt, then add cooked potatoes and onions. 4. Pour into the pan and cook until set on one side, then flip and cook the other side. Serve in wedges.

name: Egg Salad Sandwich
description: Creamy egg salad made with mayonnaise and spices, served in a sandwich.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, mustard, lettuce, bread, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Chop hard-boiled eggs and mix with mayonnaise, mustard, salt, and pepper. 2. Spread egg salad on a slice of bread and top with lettuce. 3. Place another slice of bread on top and cut in half before serving.

name: Poached Eggs with Avocado Toast
description: Creamy avocado spread on toast topped with perfectly poached eggs, a nutritious breakfast.
ingredients: eggs, bread, avocado, salt, pepper, lemon juice
instructions: 1. Toast bread until golden. 2. Mash avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon juice. 3. Poach eggs in simmering water until the whites are set. 4. Spread avocado on toast and top with poached eggs. Serve immediately.

name: Eggs Benedict
description: An English breakfast classic of poached eggs and Canadian bacon on an English muffin, topped with hollandaise sauce.
ingredients: eggs, English muffins, Canadian bacon, butter, lemon juice, egg yolks, salt
instructions: 1. Toast English muffins and cook Canadian bacon until warm. 2. Poach eggs in simmering water. 3. For hollandaise, whisk egg yolks with butter and lemon juice until thick. 4. Assemble by placing bacon on muffins, topping with poached eggs and hollandaise sauce.

name: Korean Gyeran-jjim (Steamed Eggs)
description: A fluffy Korean dish of steamed eggs, perfect as a side dish.
ingredients: eggs, water, salt, green onions
instructions: 1. Whisk eggs with water and salt until well combined. 2. Pour the mixture into a heatproof bowl. 3. Place the bowl in a steamer and steam for about 10-15 minutes until set. 4. Garnish with chopped green onions before serving.

name: Hard-Boiled Eggs with Dipping Sauce
description: Simple hard-boiled eggs served with a flavorful dipping sauce.
ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, soy sauce, sesame oil, green onions
instructions: 1. Boil eggs for 10-12 minutes and cool in ice water. 2. Peel and cut in half. 3. Mix soy sauce and sesame oil to make a dipping sauce. 4. Serve eggs with dipping sauce and sprinkle with chopped green onions.

name: Egg and Spinach Frittata
description: A baked Italian-style omelette with eggs and fresh spinach, perfect for brunch.
ingredients: eggs, spinach, cheese, onion, salt, pepper
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). 2. Sauté onions and spinach in an oven-safe skillet until spinach is wilted. 3. Whisk eggs with salt and pepper, and pour over vegetables. 4. Cook until edges are set, then transfer to the oven and bake for 15-20 minutes. Serve warm.
